articles.title: Apple's new MacBook Pro: YF breakdown
articles.content: On today's Tech Support segment, Yahoo Finance Tech Editor Dan Howley takes a deep dive into Apple's newest 16-inch MacBook Pro. Howley provides a breakdown of the latest MacBook Pro features, including pricing across the entire MacBook lineup which starts at $1599. He also explains the Apple intelligence features integrated into this newest model and outlines the specific M4 chip variants associated with each device in the updated MacBook lineup. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Angel Smith

articles.title: Apple furthers smart home push with wall-mounted tablet: BBG
articles.content: According to a Bloomberg report, Apple (AAPL) plans to launch a wall-mounted AI tablet device as it expands into the smart home market. The new tablet will include features such as controlling home appliances and video conferencing. Catalysts Co-hosts Seana Smith and Madison Mills break down the details, discussing how it could compete with competitors like Amazon's (AMZN) Alexa. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here. This post was written by Angel Smith
